row.entry: The unique ID of this row in the table.

listitem.para: -1 - Unknown Status (used only to indicate a problem with the ETL -- PLEASE NOTIFY SUPPORT)

row.entry: The total number of minutes that the data center was in the status shown in the datacenter_status column for the aggregation period. For example, if a data center was up for 55 minutes and in maintenance mode for 5 minutes during an hour, two rows will show for this hour. One will have a datacenter_status of Up and minutes_in_status of 55, the other will have a datacenter_status of Maintenance and a minutes_in_status of 5.
The data center configuration version at the time of sample.
